benefits.name: Ability Score Increase
effects: Increase your Intelligence, Wisdom, or Charisma score by 1, to a maximum of 20.

benefits.name: Telepathic Utterance
effects: You can speak telepathically to any creature you can see within 60 feet of yourself. Your telepathic utterances are in a language you know, and the creature understands you only if it knows that language. Your communication doesn't give the creature the ability to respond to you telepathically.

benefits.name: Detect Thoughts spell prepared
effects: You can cast it without a spell slot or spell components, and you must finish a

benefits.name: Long Rest before you can cast it in this way again
effects: You can also cast it using spell slots you have of the appropriate level. Your spellcasting ability for the spell is the ability increased by this feat.
